mapper.update:
update guest
GUEST_NAME = #{GUEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROOM_NUMBER = #{ROOM_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROOM_TYPE = #{ROOM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NUMBER = #{CONTRACT_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{TEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{COMPANY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{TITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSONS = #{PERSONS,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMING = #{COMING,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARKING = #{PARKING,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR = #{CAR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENT = #{COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE = #{CHARGE,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TIMEIN = #{TIMEIN,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIMEOUT = #{TIMEOUT,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_STATE = #{SYS_STATE,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OTHER_GUESTS = #{OTHER_GUESTS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GUEST_TYPE = #{GUEST_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{BIRTHDAY,jdbcType=DATE},
EMAIL = #{EMAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_CONTACTOR = #{COMPANY_CONTACTOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_TEL = #{COMPANY_TEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{COMPANY_ACCOUNT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_INVOICE = #{COMPANY_INVOICE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_PAYMODE = #{COMPANY_PAYMODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update guest set GUEST_NAME = #{GUEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROOM_NUMBER = #{ROOM_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROOM_TYPE = #{ROOM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NUMBER = #{CONTRACT_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{TEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{COMPANY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{TITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSONS = #{PERSONS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMING = #{COMING,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARKING = #{PARKING,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR = #{CAR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE = #{CHARGE,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TIMEIN = #{TIMEIN,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIMEOUT = #{TIMEOUT,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_STATE = #{SYS_STATE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OTHER_GUESTS = #{OTHER_GUESTS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUEST_TYPE = #{GUEST_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{BIRTHDAY,jdbcType=DATE}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_CONTACTOR = #{COMPANY_CONTACTOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_TEL = #{COMPANY_TEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{COMPANY_ACCOUNT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_INVOICE = #{COMPANY_INVOICE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_PAYMODE = #{COMPANY_PAYMODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from guest where GUEST_NAME like #{NAME} limit #{ST}, #{EACH}
select count(*) from guest where ROOM_NUMBER like CONCAT('%', #{ROOM_NUMBER}, '%') and GUEST_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{NAME}, '%')
